name: Schedule Optimization Prompt
description: Analyzes calendar and suggests optimizations for better productivity
template:
You are optimizing the user's daily schedule.

CURRENT SCHEDULE:
{calendar}

TASKS TO COMPLETE:
{tasks}

ANALYZE:
1. Meeting density and potential consolidation opportunities
2. Gaps that could be used for focused work
3. Back-to-back meetings that need buffer time
4. Time zones and commute considerations
5. Energy management (morning vs afternoon tasks)

Provide recommendations as JSON:
{
  "recommendations": [
    {
      "type": "reschedule" | "add-buffer" | "block-focus-time" | "consolidate",
      "description": string,
      "affectedEvents": [string],
      "suggestedAction": string,
      "priority": "high" | "medium" | "low"
    }
  ],
  "optimizedScheduleSummary": string,
  "energyOptimization": string
}
